select aa.* from ( SELECT 'head' type, a.ser no, '' uid, concat(a.company_initial, '사') bizName, b.recruit_item_contents bizTitle, b.men bizMen, b.place_work bizArea1Name , b.biz_end_type bizEndType, DATE_FORMAT(b.biz_end_day, '%m/%d') bizEndDay , DATE_FORMAT(b.date_req, '%m/%d') wdate , CASE b.prs WHEN 'P' THEN 'yes' ELSE 'no' END bizIng FROM recruit_company AS a, recruit_item AS b WHERE 1=1 and a.prs='P' AND b.prs='P' AND a.ser=b.target_ser and date_req BETWEEN DATE_ADD(NOW(),INTERVAL - 5 MONTH ) AND NOW()
UNION ALL
select 'free' type , nic.no, nic.uid, nic.biz_name bizName, nic.biz_title bizTitle, nic.biz_men bizMen , concat(getCodeName(nic.biz_area1),' ', ifnull(getCodeName(nic.biz_area2), '')) bizArea1Name , nic.biz_end_type bizEndType, DATE_FORMAT(nic.biz_end_day, '%m/%d') bizEndDay , DATE_FORMAT(nic.wdate, '%m/%d') wdate , nic.biz_ing bizIng from netfu_item_company nic where 1=1 and nic.biz_ing = 'yes' and (nic.biz_jobfrom LIKE '%netfu_34537_33276%' OR nic.biz_jobfrom LIKE '%freelancer%') and wdate BETWEEN DATE_ADD(NOW(),INTERVAL - 5 MONTH ) AND NOW()
UNION ALL

select 'recruit' type , nic.no, nic.uid, nic.biz_name bizName, nic.biz_title bizTitle, nic.biz_men bizMen , concat(getCodeName(nic.biz_area1),' ', ifnull(getCodeName(nic.biz_area2), '')) bizArea1Name , nic.biz_end_type bizEndType, DATE_FORMAT(nic.biz_end_day, '%m/%d') bizEndDay , DATE_FORMAT(nic.wdate, '%m/%d') wdate , nic.biz_ing bizIng from netfu_item_company nic where 1=1 and nic.biz_ing = 'yes' and (nic.biz_jobfrom LIKE '%netfu_48782_57525%' OR nic.biz_jobfrom LIKE '%netfu_85884_14481%') and wdate BETWEEN DATE_ADD(NOW(),INTERVAL - 5 MONTH ) AND NOW() ) aa order by rand() limit 6
